title: Login issue
description: User unable to login with correct credentials.

title: Payment failure
description: Payment gateway returning error for credit card transactions.

title: UI alignment bug
description: Dashboard widgets misaligned on smaller screens.

title: Email not received
description: Customer not receiving password reset email.

title: API timeout
description: Orders API taking more than 30 seconds to respond.

title: Mobile app crash
description: App crashes on startup on Android 14 devices.

title: Slow loading dashboard
description: Dashboard takes too long to load for enterprise customers.

title: Broken link in FAQ
description: One of the FAQ page links leads to a 404 error.

title: Data export issue
description: CSV export generates incomplete data sets.

title: Search not working
description: Search results page always returns empty results.

title: Server downtime
description: Main server went down for 2 hours causing service disruption.

title: Forgot password issue
description: Users unable to reset their password via email link.

title: App push notifications not working
description: Customers not receiving push notifications on iOS devices.

title: Invoice PDF download fails
description: Downloading invoice PDF gives 500 server error.

title: Incorrect total in checkout
description: Cart total calculation is incorrect when discount applied.

title: Profile picture upload error
description: Users cannot upload profile pictures larger than 2MB.

title: Wrong timezone in reports
description: Generated reports show incorrect timezone data.

title: Login OTP delayed
description: OTP for login sometimes arrives after 10 minutes.

title: Exported CSV format incorrect
description: CSV export is missing headers for some columns.

title: Search suggestions not showing
description: Search bar does not display suggestions as user types.
